actions.name: Claws
actions.description: You can use your claws to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d4 + your strength modifier slashing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Age
entries: Sahuagin age the same as humans.

entries.name: Size
entries: Sahuagin are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Natural Scales
entries: When you are not wearing any armor, your AC equals 12.

entries.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: You can breathe air and water, but you need to be submerged in water at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sahuagin and one language known by the people your clan trades with, most often Elvish, Gnomish, or Dwarvish.

entries.name: Elemental thoughness
entries: You can cast the {@spell absorb elements|XGE} spell once as a 1st-level spell. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Damage Resistance
entries: You have resistance to the lightning damage type
